languages.text: The character's AGI and PER are decreased in the next combat. This is a one-time penalty that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的敏捷与感知降低。此减值效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。
